Module org.nasdanika.common
Package org.nasdanika.common

Class DefaultConverter

java.lang.Object
org.nasdanika.common.ReflectiveConverter
org.nasdanika.common.DefaultConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Composeable<Converter>, Converter
Direct Known Subclasses:
Converter
public class DefaultConverter extends ReflectiveConverter
Reflective converter providing some common conversions, some of them chained
Author:
Pavel

    • toMap

      public Map<String,Object> toMap(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject eObj, Function<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject,Object> referenceProvider)
      Outputs EObject as a Map of EStructuralFeatures names to their values. Such a map can then be used to output to YAML or JSON.
      Parameters:
      eObj - EObject
      referenceProvider - Providers or values for non-containment references. If null such references are not output to the map.
      Returns:
